bug.author: huningxin
bug.summary: Face detection tutorial of OpenCV.js fails to load haar cascade files
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.3.0-dev Operating System / Platform => Web Browser Compiler => Emscripten 1.37.9
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Face detection tutorial of OpenCV.js fails to load haar cascade files <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Navigate to <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/d99/tutorial_js_face_detection.html>http://docs.opencv.org/master/d2/d99/tutorial_js_face_detection.html</denchmark-link> . The "Try it" button is expected to be enabled. But it is disabled due to haar cascade files loading error.
